m_szDocTitle: Tesla Motors (TSLA) Stock Falling Before Battery Launch Event - TheStreet
m_szDocSumamry: TheStreet Tesla Motors (TSLA) Stock Falling Before Battery Launch Event By Amanda Schiavo | 04/30/15 - 03:07 PM EDT Reprint NEW YORK ( TheStreet ) -- Shares of Tesla Motors ( TSLA - Get Report ) are down by 2.24% to $227.24 in mid-afternoon trading on Thursday, as the company is set to release its residential and commercial-scale batteries at an event scheduled for later tonight. The stock is lower as the initial excitement over the announcement wears off, MarketWatch reports, adding that Wall Street is split as to whether or not the electric car maker's stock will dip further as tends to be t
